channel.title: jquery-cookie on NewBee
channel.description: Recent content in jquery-cookie on NewBee

item.title: CHANGELOG
item.description: HEAD 1.4.0 Support for AMD. Removed deprecated method $.cookie('name', null) for deleting a cookie, use $.removeCookie('name'). $.cookie('name') now returns undefined in case such cookie does not exist (was null). Because the return value is still falsy, testing for existence of a cookie like if ( $.cookie('foo') ) keeps working without

item.title: CONTRIBUTING
item.description: ##Issues Report issues or feature requests on GitHub Issues. If reporting a bug, please add a simplified example. ##Pull requests Create a new topic branch for every separate change you make. Create a test case if you are fixing a bug or implementing an important feature. Make sure the build
